components.templateData:
Assistant Details

Name:

{{ fullAssistant.name }}

Description:

{{ fullAssistant.description || "No description available" }}

Type:

{{ fullAssistant.type }}

Model:

{{ fullAssistant.model }}

Created At:

{{ fullAssistant.createdAt | date : "medium" }}

Updated At:

{{ fullAssistant.updatedAt | date : "medium" }}

Tags:

{{ tag }}

Focused Memories:

  • Description: {{ memory.description }}

    Created At: {{ memory.createdAt | date : "medium" }}

Memory Focus Rule:

Max Results: {{ fullAssistant.memoryFocusRule.maxResults }}

Priority Tags: {{ fullAssistant.memoryFocusRule.priorityTags.join(", ") || "None" }}

Feedback Summary:

Average Rating: {{ fullAssistant.feedbackSummary.avgRating || "N/A" }}

Total Feedback: {{ fullAssistant.feedbackSummary.totalFeedback || 0 }}

  id="editor"
  [(ngModel)]="userCorrection"
  class="textarea textarea-bordered w-full h-48 bg-gray-800 text-white placeholder-gray-400"

></textarea>
